data.title: 5 Things Dallas and Fort Worth Need to Know About WAY
data.meta_description: 89.7 WAY-FM is live in Dallas and Fort Worth! We're so excited to talk with, meet, and add the wonderful people of Texas to the WAY-FM family! Here's what you can expect from us: 1. Conversation will be honest. We want to encourage you through every complicated, funny, strange, or difficult topic. We're going to just
data.text:
89.7 WAY-FM is live in Dallas and Fort Worth! We’re so excited to talk with, meet, and add the wonderful people of Texas to the WAY-FM family! Here’s what you can expect from us:

1. Conversation will be honest.

We want to encourage you through every complicated, funny, strange, or difficult topic. We’re going to just be real about our lives and learn from our triumphs and failures.

Click here to meet our shows!

2. Laughter will happen… a lot.

You know that verse that says, “A cheerful heart is good medicine?” (Proverbs 17:22) Well, we believe it. We like to have fun and do some crazy things. A lot of healing and encouragement can come through laughter, so we hope you’ll join us!

3. Music will be great.

We want you to be encouraged by the lyrics and caught up in the amazing sound. You’ll find your favorites like, tobyMac, MercyMe, for King & Country, Francesca Battistelli, and Chris Tomlin, along with others you’re sure to love like, Rend Collective, Needtobreathe, Britt Nicole, and Hawk Nelson.

If you’re a big Christian music fan, check out WAY NEW! You’ll be the first to hear new songs from your favorite artists and discover new artists you’re sure to love. You can stream it on our website or get it on the WAY NEW app on iTunes and Google Play!

4. Power FM will live on!

If you’re more of a rocker or already love the Power FM format, keep listening! We are offering this music style online and through a brand new Power FM app on iTunes and Google Play.

5. We want you to pick the music.

Help us pick the music by joining Music Team 10! Tell us which are your favorite songs, which ones we should play less of, and which new songs we should add! We really care what you have to say!

We’re excited to join you in Dallas and Fort Worth!
